entry.title: Development: 2025 - November to February
entry.summary: This is a big one! A lot has changed since the last release. Here is an overview of all the new features, improvements and bug fixes.
entry.content:
This is a big one! A lot has changed since the last release. Here is an overview of all the new features, improvements and bug fixes.

Upstream:

ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Photo Stacks & File Variants

Inspired by PhotoPrism, RAW+JPEG pairs and Live Photos are now treated as a single photo entity with multiple file variants, instead of creating separate entries. The scanner now uses a two-phase architecture: first grouping files by directory and basename, then processing each group together. A new repair job automatically merges any previously ungrouped file variants after each scan. This comes with a completely new UI for viewing and managing stacks, file variants in the lightbox sidebar, RAW badge overlays, and a unified organizing page for stacks and duplicates.

ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Duplicate Detection

A brand-new duplicate detection system using perceptual hashing! It detects exact copies via hash comparison and visual duplicates using a memory-efficient two-pass algorithm that works well even with very large collections. The API supports a batch_size parameter to fine-tune performance for your hardware.

ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Photo UUID Primary Key & Structured Metadata

The Photo model's primary key has been changed from image_hash to UUID, which is a massive internal refactor touching models, APIs, serializers, background tasks, and tests. Alongside this, a new structured PhotoMetadata model with edit history has been added, enabling richer metadata management.

ðŸš€ Frontend: Public Album Sharing Options

Public album sharing now supports fine-grained per-album settings. You can control the visibility of location, camera info, timestamps, captions, and faces for each shared album. Default sharing preferences can be configured in user settings, and individual albums can override them.

ðŸš€ Frontend: Slideshow Mode

A new slideshow mode has been added to the lightbox with a configurable slide interval. Sit back and enjoy your photos!

ðŸš€ Frontend: Explore Page

The navigation dropdown has been replaced with a dedicated explore page, giving you a much better overview of your albums, people, places, things and events at a glance.

ðŸš€ Frontend: Redesigned Album & Statistics Pages

The album page and all statistics/data visualization pages (face clusters, social graph, word clouds, timeline, place tree) have been completely redesigned with a fresh new look.

ðŸš€ Frontend: Spotlight Search

A new spotlight search powered by Mantine replaces the old search bar, providing a faster and more intuitive search experience with keyboard navigation.

ðŸš€ Frontend: Select All

You can now select all photos in a view for bulk operations like deleting, sharing, or adding to albums.

  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Switch from Photon to Nominatim as default reverse geocoding provider
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: New endpoint for getting all albums for a photo
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Improved scan error handling and stack detection
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Split directory_watcher into a well-structured package with two-phase scan
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Social graph error logging improvements
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: ARM CPU instruction set detection refactored and fixed
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Add SQLite support for UUID primary key migration
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Fullscreen mode in lightbox
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Switched to MapLibre GL with PhotoPrism tile server for all map views
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Improved UX for setting photo location with geocode search
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Improved UX for albums with cover picker and better album list view
  • âœ¨ Frontend: New languages added to the UI
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Improved first time setup experience and default empty state messages
  • âœ¨ Frontend: File variants UI in photo details sidebar
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Metadata section component in lightbox
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Download options now include stacked/variant photos
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Improved scrolling behavior
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Extract inline styles into CSS modules (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Replaced airbnb ESLint config with eslint:recommended + prettier; removed unused dependencies (react-spring, react-vis, react-d3-graph)
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Major dependency updates (jwt-decode v4, i18next v25, react-i18next v15, @tabler/icons-react v3, react-cookie v7, and more)
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Replaced ReactPlayer with native video element for better video playback
  • âœ¨ Docker: Remove SQLite data dir creation from entrypoint
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix scan progress stuck below 100% when files are skipped or invalid (Implemented by Nikoh77)
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix scan job not being marked as finished when no files need processing (Implemented by Nikoh77)
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix bugs when not having any data
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix big thumbnail content type for proxied responses (#1271)
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix social graph SQL query to work with UUID primary key
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix UnboundLocalError in face extraction from dlib
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix pagination crash with negative page_size
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix video playback issues in lightbox
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix photo list flickering
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix server stats parsing for CPU info fields
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix upload issues with sequential file uploads and query invalidation
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix number of deleted images when selecting all
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix face dashboard issues and face mutation hooks
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix issues with shared by me albums view
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix memory hog issue
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix login popup messages
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Fix ESLint errors (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Updated dependencies and updated language strings from the community

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

entry.title: Development: 2025 - September and October
entry.summary: Breaking change change your volume mount path!
entry.content:
Breaking change: Postgres v18+: change your volume mount path!

With Postgres v18+, mounting a volume to /var/lib/postgresql/data can fail in Docker/Kubernetes due to an upstream change that enforces a new data directory (/var/lib/postgresql/MAJOR/docker) and adds a symlink from /var/lib/postgresql/data to /var/lib/postgresql (details).

Action required: Mount your volume to /var/lib/postgresql instead. pgautoupgrade will detect any existing data there and migrate it to the new structure (discussion: pgautoupgrade#164).

Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos/Frontend: You can now edit GPS locations
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Upgraded to Mantine 8.3 and fixed linting errors (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Using Argon2PasswordHasher for new and updated accounts for faster authentication
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Handle empty recently added photo queries
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix BLIP on newer versions of librephotos
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix proxy redirects for non-ASCII original photo paths
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix LLM models downloading even when none was selected
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix a bug when uploading images
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Updated dependencies and updated language strings from the community

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

entry.title: Development: 2025 - May
entry.content:
Upstream:

ðŸš€ Backend: Added Moondream 2 for caption generation

The backend integrated the Moondream 2 model (via llama-cpp-python) for image+text analysis, marking images as multi-modal inputs. This lays groundwork for more advanced AI features like richer automatic captions or visual queries by allowing the AI to handle both image and text together.

âœ¨ Frontend: Keyboard shortcuts in Lightbox

You can now use keyboard shortcuts in the lightbox to navigate photos, toggle the info sidebar, and even delete images â€“ all without touching the mouse! Helpful tooltips have been added to the UI to remind you of these new shortcuts

Smaller things:

  • âœ¨ Backend: Refactored photo captioning and search
  • âœ¨ Backend: Resolved some noisy logger warnings (Implemented by emmanuel-ferdman)
  • ðŸ”¨ Backend: Normal users can now create albums again
  • âœ¨ Frontend: It is now possible to delete images from the lightbox
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed the download photos action
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed the places tree page
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed mobile view of photos

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

entry.title: Development: 2025 - April
entry.content:
Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ Frontend: Switched from RTK Query and Redux to Tanstack Query

The syntax of RTK Query was difficult to work with, and Redux introduced unnecessary complexity for our needs. With TanStack Query, data fetching feels much more natural and removes the need for boilerplate like slices or global state management for async data.

  • ðŸš€ Frontend: Switched from React Router to Tanstack Router

Switching to TanStack Router improves consistency with TanStack Query, enables typesafe URL-based state management, and supports powerful features like intent-based fetching â€” all with deeper integration options out of the box.

  • âœ¨ Frontend: Overhauled Face Dashboard controls
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Add keyboard navigation to the lightbox
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Disable password change on demo site (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Extracted a thumbnail model from the photo model
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Updated dependencies and updated language strings from the community
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed a lot of small issues

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

entry.title: Development: 2024 - October
entry.content:
Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Reintroduce Classification

This change aims to reintroduce classification, while keeping the current clustering intact. Clustering was chosen, because it works well in a cold start scenario, where the user does not have any persons. Common problems with clustering are that there is no way to only match faces to known persons, and that previous input does not improve the clustering results. Classification should solve this problem! Instead of finding all the clusters, classification will match all unknown faces with already known persons instead.

  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Faces are now only soft deleted
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: All cluster and classification probabilities are now saved
  • âœ¨ Frontend: New Light box for viewing images
  • âœ¨ Frontend: You can now delete faces from the lightbox
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Hovering over a name in the sidebar, will outline the face
  • âœ¨ Frontend: There is now a separate "Unknown" section in the face dashboard
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Inferred faces are now the first tab, instead of the last
  • âœ¨ Frontend: New filter for viewing cluster or classifications
  • âœ¨ Frontend: New filter for label probability
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Photo details now return, if the face was inferred or labelled and the probability
  • âœ¨ Frontend: The face of the person and the old name are now visible when renaming
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Updated dependencies and updated language strings from the community

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

entry.title: Development: 2024 - September
entry.content:
Upstream:

  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Blacklist auth tokens on logout (Found by ZeroPath's Beta Business Logic scanner)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Updated dependencies and updated language strings from the community
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: New auth token blacklist endpoint (Found by ZeroPath's Beta Business Logic scanner)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Enhanced support for UhuruPhotos by expanding the PhotoSummary endpoints with additional fields. If you're using the UhuruPhotos app, be sure to update your LibrePhotos instance to ensure compatibility, as older versions will not work with the latest app update.

Upcoming:

I know, that not that many things got shipped this month, so here is an overview of things to come next month:

Reintroduce Face Classification

This pull request aims to reintroduce classification, while keeping the current clustering intact. Clustering was chosen, because it works well in a cold start scenario, where the user does not have any persons. Common problems with clustering are that there is no way to only match faces to known persons, and that previous input does not improve the clustering results. Classification should solve this problem for large datasets, where all persons are already known and it respects previous user input. Due to the large scale of this change, this was not ready for shipping yet.

Upgrade to Mantine 7:

As a component library, we use Mantine, which had a big version jump to version 7. This version removes emotion for styles and improves SSR capabilities while adding a lot of new components. However, due to the switch from emotion to native CSS and huge list of things that need to migrated, this took longer then expected.

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

entry.title: Development: 2024 - June
entry.content:
Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Split up scan job in smaller tasks

This is a pretty big change. Instead of doing all the work for each image, we will now prioritize creating a thumbnail and making the image visible in the UI and pushing other tasks like looking for faces or generating tags later.

  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Updated dependencies and updated language strings from the community
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos API: Job progress is now reported slightly different
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos/Frontend: Merge minor versions automatically
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Default background worker is now the number of cores of the host system

entry.title: Development: 2024 - April
entry.content:
Upstream:

âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Improved service management The services now get started with Django and there is a cron job, which checks if the service is still running. There are now a bunch of new endpoints for handling services. [GET] /services/: List all services [GET] /services/{id}/: Retrieve the health status of a service [POST] /services/{id}/start/: Start a service [POST] /services/{id}/stop/: Stop a service

  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Do not download model, if "none" is selected

entry.title: Development: 2023 - December
entry.content:
*Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: You can now download a large language model to post process captions

Now you can add previous attained knowledge to captions like names and places. This is a setting, which should only be used be high performance systems with at least 16GB RAM, because large language models are cutting edge tech.

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: You can now see the image tag on the sidebar

  • âœ¨ Frontend: Already existing tags will now get suggested, if you enter #
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Implemented a rich text editor for nice rendering of tags in caption textarea
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Continuation of migrating to RTQ (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Allow searching for lenses like "front camera"
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Calculating Clip Embeddings is now a separate service
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Image captioning is now a separate service and unloads after 30 seconds

entry.title: Development: 2023 - November
entry.content:
Survey:

I want to answer two questions: What is the best way to implement automatic image captioning, and what systems are the users of LibrePhotos using?

Fill out this questionnaire, to help me out! https://forms.gle/vJjzxwpXf5vwTm9v9

Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: You can now download a new image captioning model called BLIP
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Shared album will now be visible in URL, which allows for deep-linking. (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Tons of maintainability issue fixed by sickelap
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Progress of downloading models is now visible in the logs
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Updated around a bunch of dependencies and updated language strings from the community
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Download of pictures should work now, even if the zip file is large. Fixed by AnkurPrabhu

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

Sponsoring development:

My work is sponsored by 10 awesome people!

If you like the work I do, then you can support me via GitHub sponsors or via PayPal

entry.title: Development: 2023 - October
entry.content:
Survey:

I want to answer two questions: What is the best way to implement automatic image captioning, and what systems are the users of LibrePhotos using?

Fill out this questionnaire, to help me out! https://forms.gle/vJjzxwpXf5vwTm9v9

Interview:

I did an interview with console. If you want to know more about me and the project, you can find the interview here: https://console.substack.com/p/console-180

Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Machine Learning models will now get downloaded on the first scan and saved within the protected_media folder. This reduces the size of the cpu based image by 50%, which should make updating faster.
  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: You can now see the available space on the sidebar on the right!
  • ðŸš€ Frontend: You can now filter by photo and by video (Implemented by AnkurPrabhu)
  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: ONNX is now available as an ML execution engine
  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: You can now select the image caption model you want to use
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Search query will now be visible in URL, which allows for deep-linking. (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Tons of maintainability issue fixed by sickelap
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: A lot of new and improved translations from the community
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Updated around 40 dependencies
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Face recognition should now work on the GPU image
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed an issue, where public photos with no timestamp breaks settings

New Issues:

  • ðŸž Nextcloud integration does not work (Link)

  • ðŸ’¡ Zoom out to display more thumbnails in the gallery (Link)

  • ðŸž Possible issue while Scanning with Network Mount? (Link)

  • ðŸž Cuda initialization error in latest GPU backend (Link) Details section on public page (Link)

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

Sponsoring development:

My work is sponsored by 9 awesome people!

If you like the work I do, then you can support me via GitHub sponsors or via PayPal

entry.title: Development: 2023 - July
entry.content:
Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Deprecated redis and redis-rq with django-q2

django-q2 will give us a lot of new possibilities. The most important one is, that the queue will actually be remembered. In the future the queue can be modified and has native options for cron jobs.

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: More settings for face detection and face clustering

There are five new settings, which you can tweak, to make it better fit your dataset. I hope that there will be a couple of people who will try out all the different settings, so that we can find better defaults :)

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Scanning uploaded photos happens automatically when completed
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Load top groups first in PhotoListView
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Fetching photoDetails was refactored to RTK
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Upgraded all dependencies
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Upgraded alot of dependencies
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: A lot of new and improved translations from the community
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed videos don't play when navigating to "Sharing" - "Shared with you" (...)
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed videos as cover_photos in sharing
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed scrolling down leaves empty spaces and invalid page
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed bad album alignment on mobile view
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed nextcloud import
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed people thumbnails
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed long running jobs not starting
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed reading of exif data from .jxl files

New Issues:

  • ðŸ› Video previews hangs when listing a huge amount of videos (Link)
  • ðŸ› Drop-down menu judders (Link)
  • ðŸ› Error creating Matpotlib cache (Link)
  • ðŸ› Documentation Website Update (Link)
  • ðŸ› Sharing high amounts of pictures with other user(s) fails (Link)
  • ðŸ› Face training is ineffective (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Optimize counter tiles on library page for mobile view (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Add scan progress to library page (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Allow to upload photos directly to user albums (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Add Folders as an Photos view (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Allow remembering credentials on login page (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Add birthdate and other info for a face (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Make faces be a possibility in more than one person in case of mistake (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Remove face when looking at a photo if wrongfully assigned (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Filter by Video/Photos on main screen (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Switch to maplibre-gl and map provider (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Allow users to upload media to shared albums (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Increase max number of heavyweight workers (Link)

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

Sponsoring development:

If you like the work I do, then you can support me via GitHub sponsors or via PayPal

entry.title: Development: 2023 - June
entry.content:
Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: You can now save captions (Implemented by abdulasiraj)
  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Support reading XMP face metadata
  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Uploading does not need CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS anymore
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Clicking on the image icon in Face Dashboard now displays the original photo
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Face Dashboard now re-renders less, which should lead to a better experience
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Unknown - Other Faces, will now get matched to a person, if the confidence is larger than 50%
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Finding confidence values for faces is now faster
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Logo linking to home
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Documentation is now linked in the sidebar
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: django-admin now contains all models
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Performance improvements for a couple of endpoints
  • âœ¨ Frontend: A lot of fetching was refactored to RTK (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: A lot of new and improved translations from the community
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed opening shared albums resulting in a blank page
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed empty names of persons
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fixed Videos don't show the player and left/right arrows are missing
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Videos are now viewable in the light box in FaceDashboard
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed a Timeout when loading persons with a lot of faces
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed Timestamps not generating for IMG_20230101_A.jpg
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed reading of exif data from .jxl files

New Issues:

  • ðŸ› UserViewSet returns too much information for regular users (Link)
  • ðŸ› Compose container renaming broken as described in docs (Link)
  • ðŸ› Unable to browse and scan Nextcloud Directories (Link)
  • ðŸ› Running Calculate Clip Embeddings doesn't work on read only files (Link)
  • ðŸ› Sharing high amounts of pictures with other user(s) fails (Link)
  • ðŸ› Face training is ineffective (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Allow external process to signal file addition (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Add "move face to unknown - other" and "delete face" options to image browser (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Add hability to download albums (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Improve docker image versioning (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Docs on memory requirements (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Ability to back up face scoring models (Link)

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

If you like the work I do, then you can support me via GitHub sponsors or via PayPal

entry.title: Development: 2023 - April
entry.summary: Breaking change: You have to add CSRFTRUSTEDORIGINS with the URL you want to access it from in order to upload assets and if you want to access the Django admin panel / silk / swagger
entry.content:
Breaking change: You have to add CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS with the URL you want to access it from in order to upload assets and if you want to access the Django admin panel / silk / swagger

Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: We now support Motion Photos from Samsung and Google Phones (Implemented by sickelap)
  • ðŸš€ Frontend: New library page (Implemented by jcalado )
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Migrate directory list to RTK (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Move to Django 4 and psycopg3
  • âœ¨ Docker: Use Ubuntu lunar
  • âœ¨ Docker: Add libjxl to dependencies
  • âœ¨ Docker: Bump to python 3.11, should give a performance boost
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Django Admin now accessible under api/django-admin
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Cluster size will now increase with increase of faces
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Bubble up exceptions more consistently
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Only calculate hash once (Implemented by savvasdalkitsis)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Improve /api/person performance
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: A lot of new and improved translations from the community
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix nextcloud job scheduling (Implemented by sickelap)
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Do not show hidden photos as a cover image for auto album
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Use BigInt for size, fixes a crash in scan photos
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Sort directories alphabetically
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Ensure that only persons for a given user are loaded in FaceListView
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix scanning behavior when rescanning a photo
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Always ensure that a cluster has a user
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Remove people without faces when clustering
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix error handling when categorizing photos
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix FirstTimeSetup when there is also a deleted user in the system
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix delete
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fix check files
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Do not show "finished task" twice
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Count faces correctly
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Truncate text in ModalPersonEdit
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Show more useful values in worker logs
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Invalidate UserList when you create a new user
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Don't scroll when LightBox is open
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Allow downloading images from lightbox
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Center Lightbox image by overriding getTransform
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Do not allow zooming for videos
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Handle invalid token more gracefully
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix album sharing
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix header for shared albums
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix avatar in sharing dialog
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Keep mobile footer consistent
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Rerender less in FaceDashboard
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Remove cookies on logout
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Fix padding and scroll issues in PhotoListView
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Sort persons alphabetically (Implemented by Nerodacles)

New Issues:

  • ðŸ’¡ Allow Users to Select Different Face Thumbnail (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Ditch the predatory Mapbox for something that actually has a free tier (Link)
  • ðŸ› Auto album generation stuck (looks like #584) (Link)
  • ðŸ› Problem with Nextcloud import (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Access to photo folders owned by other users (Link)
  • ðŸ› Default timezone not being applied (Link)
  • ðŸ› "Calculate Clip Embeddings" looks completed but in fact is not (Link)
  • ðŸ› Errors in new Web UI (Link)
  • ðŸ› Face dashboard displays a totally empty page on the latest dev (Link)
  • ðŸ› Scan crashes on character '\udceb' (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Added Assets processed by Rescan all Photos in Response (Link)
  • ðŸ› Calculate Clip Embeddings stuck (like #758?) (Link)
  • ðŸ› Undesired popup appears (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Document secret.key (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ IPTC support? (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Switch from FAISS to pgvector (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Replace square_thumbnail_small with thumbhash (Link)
  • ðŸ› Unable to display picture / run video from detail tab (original file) if accentuated : error 404 (Link)
  • ðŸ› Scan keeps failing (Link)

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

If you like the work I do, then you can support me via GitHub sponsors or via PayPal

entry.title: Development: 2023 - March
entry.content:
Upstream

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: We now have a new docs page!
  • ðŸš€ Mobile: Added downloading image to local storage
  • ðŸš€ Mobile: Implemented backing up photos
  • ðŸš€ Mobile: Implemented to remove backed up images
  • ðŸš€ Mobile: Show local images
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Improve test coverage (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ Mobile: List rendering now faster
  • âœ¨ Docs: Added docs for uploading images
  • âœ¨ Docs: Added docs for job system
  • âœ¨ Docs: Added docs for settings
  • âœ¨ Docs: Updated features for Google Photos and Immich (Implemeted by WhiteHatRootkitJedi and justadri)
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed ARM64/PyTorch Fatal Python error: Illegal instruction
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed import of RAW (.NEF) files
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Fixed a bug, where removing missing images would get stucl
  • ðŸ”¨ Mobile: Login does now work correctly with case-sensitive usernames

New Issues:

  • ðŸ› Can share picture but not albums (Link)
  • ðŸ› [CRITICAL] WORKER TIMEOUT (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Support for google motion photos (Link)
  • ðŸ› Hidden file can be event album cover (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Add JXL file support (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ ability to deselect subfolders for inclusion (Link)
  • ðŸ› No local photos (Link)
  • ðŸ› Scan job exits with exception Internal Server Error: /api/jobs/(Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Implement backing up only certain locations (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Implement uploading images from the background (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Notify the user to activate MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Replace pylint, black and isort with ruff (Link)
  • ðŸ› Delete Missing Photos Stuck (Link)
  • ðŸ› Long name in face selection don't work well (Link)
  • ðŸ› The faces tab scrolling is very slow with huge amount of face to sort (Link)
  • ðŸ› In face tab when typing the name it says person already exist and can't see to this (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ In faces tab, have the possibility to sort by more photos that match faces (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Implement viewing videos (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Migrate to TypeScript ([Link] (https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/762))
  • ðŸ’¡ Implement directory permission checker (Link)
  • ðŸ’¡ Single sourcing of state management and translations between frontend and mobile (Link)

If you are interested on how I develop this application, you can watch me develop features live on my channel

entry.title: Development: 2023 - January / February
entry.content:
Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Local photos now show up in main Feed. Also showing sync state (local/remote/synced) in preparation of full photo sync
  • ðŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Choosing Camera folder if more than one folder exists inside DCIM folder
  • ðŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Allowing user to set max memory and disk caches up to their device maximums
  • ðŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Showing progress notification for full feed sync
  • ðŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Showing current/total progress in notification for jobs
  • ðŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Allowing user to cancel jobs from the notification from feed
  • ðŸš€ UhuruPhotos: Showing local media in the photo map
  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: It's now opt-in if you want your profile to be public (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Improve testing tool chain and added tests (Implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Camera media are prioritised when scanning local media so they appear faster in the UI and in the feed
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Showing both local and remote paths for media in Lightbox details
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Hiding the refresh day button on feed for days with only local media
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Opening app when tapping notification
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Showing local media status (permissions and sync) on the main
  • âœ¨ UhuruPhotos: Lightbox displays media sync status (synced/local/remote) when navigating
  • ðŸ”¨ UhuruPhotos: Fixing bug with precaching thumbnails constantly restarting
  • âœ¨ Translations: More Vietnamese, Spanish, Italian, Ukrainian, Norwegian, Russian, German translations by stnokott, Vistaus, cyrasafia , hsa00000, J. Lavoie, BMN, Atalanttore, RandomHacks-Git, IhorHordiichuk, Nerodacles, renemadeira, zlo2k, gallegonovato and many more
  • ðŸ”¨ LibrePhotos: Expose only relevant data when using /api/user/
  • ðŸ”¨ Frontend: Searching for people works again (Implemented by Nerodacles)
  • ðŸ”¨ Mobile: Login does now work correctly with case-sensitive usernames
  • ðŸ”¨ UhuruPhotos: Fixed bug where local photo albums would have photos jump around showing up in wrong dates
  • ðŸ”¨ UhuruPhotos: There was still a bug with precaching which should now be fixed. (thanks @á“°á•µá•µá“ for spotting it)
  • ðŸ”¨ UhuruPhotos: Fixing notification icon
  • ðŸ”¨ UhuruPhotos: "Do Not Ask Again" button in Feed actually remembers preference

New Issues:

  • ðŸ’¡ Update people thumbnails ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/759))
  • ðŸ› Calculate Clip Embeddings Stuck ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/758))
  • ðŸ’¡ Run librephotos from URL subdirectory ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/757))
  • ðŸ› LibrePhotos keeps restarting and cannot access pages ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/755))
  • ðŸ’¡ Better People searching ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/754))
  • ðŸ’¡ Add deduplication ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/753))
  • ðŸ’¡ Multiple scan directory ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/751))
  • ðŸ’¡ Video library filter ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/750))
  • ðŸ’¡ Manually detect/outline faces ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/749))
  • ðŸ’¡ Manually add people to a photo ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/748))
  • ðŸ’¡ feature flag support ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/747))
  • ðŸ’¡ Import already tagged faces with 3rd party software ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/746))
  • ðŸ› Scanning faces broken: get() returned more than one Cluster -- it returned 2! ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/745))
  • ðŸ› ARM64/PyTorch Fatal Python error: Illegal instruction ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/744))
  • ðŸ› Librephotos search is very inaccurate ([Link] https://github.com/LibrePhotos/librephotos/issues/742))

entry.title: Development: 2022 - Week 46 / 47 / 48 / 49 / 50
entry.content:
Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: You can now reset datetime rules (Implemented by sickelap)

entry.title: Development: 2022 - Week 42 / 43 / 44 / 45
entry.content:
Upstream:

  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: You can now sort faces by date (Implemented by 5m4u66y)
  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Scrollbar now shows the date in PhotoListView (Implemented by 5m4u66y)
  • ðŸš€ LibrePhotos: Scrollbar now shows the name of the person in FaceDashboard (Implemented by 5m4u66y)
  • âœ¨ LibrePhotos: Migration to Mantine v5 (implemented by sickelap)
  • âœ¨ Frontend: Replaced moment.js with luxon
  • âœ¨ Frontend: You can now also change the time taken of a photo
  • âœ¨ Translations: More Vietnamese, Spanish, Italian, Ukrainian, Norwegian, German translations by stnokott, Vistaus, Matthew Wu (å´å˜‰ä¿Š), hsa00000, J. Lavoie, BMN, loulou91, RandomHacks-Git, IhorHordiichuk, Nerodacles, TouchySpidey, Gau Map, gallegonovato
